title: Greatest Common Factor
text: The first step is to rearrange our equation to have terms with common elements grouped together.

title: Greatest Common Factor
text: What will our equation look like if we rearrange it to have common elements grouped together?

title: Greatest Common Factor
text: The next step is to factor out the GCF from the first two groups of the equation.

title: Greatest Common Factor
text: What will our equation look like if we factor out the first two groups?

title: Greatest Common Factor
text: The next step is to combine our two groups into one by finding the greatest common factor.

title: Greatest Common Factor
text: What does our final equation look like once we factor out the item?
